item.title: About
item.description:
About this blog

Contents

This blog - surprise - mirrors my personal interest. Those are versatile but mostly related with information technic in any sense. Topics I am interested in are:

  • Project Management
  • Artificial Intelligence especially Large Language Models and Agent Systems
  • Software Development especially in Haskell and Rust
  • Books
  • …

Me

I am a product owner in a very technical field with a degree in materials engineering. After several years in academics and science, I started as a software developer, architect, consultant and project manager. Finally I settled as a product owner and think that’s my best decision ever.
